Header: Mayweather Jr. vs Manny Pacquiao – the Fight of the century
Content: Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao will duke it out in in MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas in what’s been dubbed the “Fight of the Century.” 50 Cent and Diddy put money on Mayweather, who’s favored to win, but Mark Wahlberg is betting on Pacquiao. Regardless of who you want to win, though, there’s one thing we can all agree on: There is a gargantuan amount of money tied to this fight! The fight itself expected to generate more than $300 million in pay-per-view revenue. According to ESPN, Mayweather can expect to clear $180 million of this, with the remaining $120 million going to Pacquiao. These predictions, mind you, are contract-based, so regardless of who wins and who loses, both fellas are making bank off this blow-out. (The winner will get extra royalties from the fight’s sponsors and future endorsements, but still, loser makes it out OK, too.)
